name: sbiedv
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), w2))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w1, w2)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), w2))
-| wnf(s1, w0)
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w1, w2)))

|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wnf(s1, w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), w2))
-| wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wb(w1, w2)))
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wb(w1, w2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wsb(s0, s1, w1), w2))
-| diffsw(s1, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w2)
-| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))), wb(w1, w2))

comment: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution (deduction version of ~ sbie ). (Contributed by NM, 7-Jan-2017.)
